p: Some investigators have proposed that MIS-C, while having very different epidemiologic and some different laboratory features compared with KD, could provide etiologic clues that KD may result from infection with a coronavirus ( 4, 10). The Table outlines some differing features of KD and coronavirus infections that make an etiologic relationship unlikely. Moreover, if SARS-CoV-2 or a closely related virus was a KD etiologic agent, one would expect the epidemiology of MIS-C and KD to be similar. Of note, MIS-C cases have not been observed in China ( 14) or Japan, countries with the highest prevalence of KD in the world, which surely should have been expected if there was an etiologic relationship between KD and MIS-C.
